summary: FORD IS DISCONTINUING THE SAFETY FEATURE SYNC MY FORD TOUCH SERVICE WHICH WAS PART OF THE PURCHASE AGREEMENT.  THIS IS A SAFETY FEATURE OF THE VEHICLE PROVIDING OPERATOR ASSISTANCE, TRAFFIC ALERTS, TURN BY TURN DIRECTIONS, AND OTHER SAFETY RELATED SERVICES. THEY ARE NOT OFFERING A REPLACEMENT OR OPTION TO UPGRADE TO THE NEW SYNC 3 SERVICE.  I AM BEING CHEATED ON WHAT I PURCHASED AS DESCRIBED ON THE WINDOW STICKER AND IN THE OWNER'S MANUAL.
